welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bixby, a charming city known for its friendly locals and beautiful scenery. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at R.Lloyd Jones Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at R.Lloyd Jones Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Okmulgee Airport serves all commercial and private flights.
